Articles.Content:
This is the thread for all things insane, therefore being sane if off topic! Stop being sane!

sanity going slowly must resiiiiiiisjfadnglkjdngljsen;djldGNfdjsnKJFNsgkjdn\gkndslkjnafkldsnm;lkdfsnaz.a/lkvdamfkad;sld.,fn;flk

What is this ...sanity you speak of? *Drinks tea upside down while my turtle battles a duck*

I want a cup of tea now. Preferably the correct way up.
You're thinking three dimensional. To under stand you must think in at least four or five dimensional thought.

You're thinking three dimensional. To under stand you must think in at least four or five dimensional thought.

But there is in fact 11 dimensions. Most are compressed so small we can't notice them. And if the fourth dimension is time, then why do we experience time in a 3D world? Perhaps we are a 3D world with a linear 4th dimension-time?

But there is in fact 11 dimensions. Most are compressed so small we can't notice them. And if the fourth dimension is time, then why do we experience time in a 3D world? Perhaps we are a 3D world with a linear 4th dimension-time?

If one was aware of all dimensions that one exists in you could not be alive as you would never change. Life is a form of 1 dimensional space travel and to be aware on the conscious level of all points in time that align with you would make you a 4d statue.

HOYE SITE WE ARE ALL A STATUE GARDEN

Some 6d alien has created the earth as a installation piece in an art museum. You are post dimensional impressionism.
My GI tract stinks. One glass of perfume please.

If one was aware of all dimensions that one exists in you could not be alive as you would never change. Life is a form of 1 dimensional space travel and to be aware on the conscious level of all points in time that align with you would make you a 4d statue.

HOYE SITE WE ARE ALL A STATUE GARDEN

Some 6d alien has created the earth as a installation piece in an art museum. You are post dimensional impressionism.

The question is whether we are original or modern art?

But there is in fact 11 dimensions. Most are compressed so small we can't notice them. And if the fourth dimension is time, then why do we experience time in a 3D world? Perhaps we are a 3D world with a linear 4th dimension-time?

There are an infinit number of dimensions. Not just 11. And time is not a dimension it is a point of perspective.

There are an infinit number of dimensions. Not just 11.

Wonder what the rest are or if they exist for us but are compressed so small.
Nope, there just bigger and bigger. Your to small to see them.

There are an infinit number of dimensions. Not just 11. And time is not a dimension it is a point of perspective.

http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/M-theory
The problem with M-theory is its untestability. Completely unlike loop quantum gravity.

If time is not the fourth dimension then what is?

The universe is full of wonders we are only beginning to comprehend. If only we can learn to not kill each other.

Edit: Lets not get into a argument about which theory is better ok?
No, you're right. Ten pages of planes is clearly better than me posting one simple little fact about M-theory.

More planes? Ok then:

A wooden jet which the glue that holds it together eats away at the wood itself and the intake behind the cockpit. What a great combination!
And thus, there were planes.
Planes...
Ok then: And thus, there were aircraft!
What about the possibility of plains?
*Beats you to death with Airfix models*
Plains.
Plane:

Plains.
Everyone's going to comPLAIN about this joke (I capitalized it cause i don't want to exPLAIN the pun).....

Everyone's going to comPLAIN about this joke (I capitalized it cause i don't want to exPLAIN the pun).....

Ahhhhhg! Brain...is...melting!
The "joke" was bad enough to begin with. <.<
